name: Oversight Committee
description:
WARNING: At least one player has had to restart their computer as a result of going into fullscreen mode. This issue is being looked into and this warning will be removed if/when it is resolved. Fullscreen does work on some systems so try it if you dare.

Oversight Committee is a turn based strategy game. 

Play the leader of a global network consisting of the political elite, megacorp barons, and information surveillance entities. 

Your network of agents in high places wishes to shape the world.
But be warned. 
A major rival network exists, with different plans in mind.

Bring assets to agents within various sectors. 
Manage your network by keeping your agents loyal.
Undermine the enemy network through infiltration, sabotage, and assassination.
